description: If it had an option to save current jack connections in graph as is to patchbay, it would be extreamly useful, especially if it supports all LSP plugins connected from Carla or other softwares.
That's the remit of the plugins and application. I've used LSP plugins (LV2 format) with both Qtractor and Ardour. The connections are saved as part of the session from both of those applications.

Don't work directly installing from store.

Run this command on terminal instead: 
sudo yum install jack-audio-connection-kit qjackctl --allowerasing
summary: It doesn't work on Fedora 36 Gnome
